Package com.epoch.utils

Classes containing utility methods.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthUtils
    Manages password security.
    CharReencoder
    Methods for interconverting UTF-8 and Latin-1 characters, character entity references, and UCS-2 characters.
    DateUtils
    For manipulating java.util.Date.
    DisplayRules
    Singleton class that holds the regular expressions for converting text to HTML display.
    MathMethods
    Holds math utility functions.
    MathUtils
    Holds math utility functions.
    SortUtils
    Methods for sorting objects that are not comparable into an order given by one or more String or Integer keys that are themselves comparable.
    Utils
    Array, List, String manipulation methods.

Package com.epoch.utils Description

Classes containing utility methods.
